text: a pravacakanmarkkusesam nam maryaminre makan isaye niyeagiccu. addeham terattil ninn tanre munnilullavaye sarivekkunnavanayirunnu. nam addehattin veliccavum nervaliyumulla incil nalki. at terattil ninn annullavaye sarivekkunnatayirunnu. bhaktanmarkk nervali kanikkunnatum sadupadesam nalkunnatum
